examples: They lived in fear of their master.
Vivían con miedo de su amo.
the exploitation of slaves by their former masters
la explotación de esclavos por sus antiguos amos
His political masters are all old right-wing politicians.
Sus amos políticos son todos viejos políticos de derecha.
Many nations were trying to shake off their colonial masters.
Muchas naciones estaban tratando de deshacerse de sus amos coloniales.
